title: Matchmaking is unfair
body: So i just had a game, i'm pre plat currently gold 2, so you'd think i would be placed with people similar to my own rank atleast but i just had 2 teamates who were below lvl 25, me being the highest rank on my team and the enemy team was entirely high gold-high plat currently. In saying this these people just got trampled on and we lost the game but should people that low even be matched with me and these other people?

replies.body:
Ranked MMR has no effect at all on Normal MMR.

Someone who is challenger can easily be matched with people who are under level 30 in Normals, especially at certain times of the day.
its a normal game, you're fine.
That's besides the point, i don't expect to have to be teamed up with people who don't even know how the game works while the enemy team are all veterans.

> [{quoted}](name=Wilson621,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=pQcvMHxb,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2017-02-13T06:02:26.712+0000)
>
> That's besides the point, i don't expect to have to be teamed up with people who don't even know how the game works while the enemy team are all veterans.

I'm sure these lower level player "know how the game works".

What a douche comment dude.

Or did you mean teamed up with players that have less experience?
Like yourself to those Platinums who beat your team? 

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}}
it's a normal game! you'll be fine.
